title: Remove shareable preview image action from admin dashboard UI

requirements.summary: Remove any admin-dashboard UI control labeled “Open shareable preview image” and ensure no dashboard interaction opens the share-preview image in a new tab/window.
acceptanceCriteria: When viewing the admin dashboard route, there is no button/link/menu item labeled “Open shareable preview image”.
No dashboard UI interaction opens the shareable preview image in a new tab/window.
The removal does not affect non-dashboard pages (e.g., the public homepage) unless the removed control was actually shared/reused by the dashboard.

file_operations.description: Remove any dashboard header action/link/menu entry labeled “Open shareable preview image” and any associated click handler (e.g., window.open) if present or introduced via shared header variants; confirm the dashboard header renders without that control.

Audit and remove any dashboard-level UI wiring that could render or trigger “Open shareable preview image” (including any callback that opens the generated share-preview image in a new tab/window) while keeping all other dashboard functionality unchanged.
Ensure the dashboard table does not include any action labeled “Open shareable preview image” and does not open the share-preview image asset; keep existing document view/download behaviors intact.
Verify dashboard filters do not render or reference any action labeled “Open shareable preview image”; remove any such UI element if found without impacting filtering/sorting.
